title: gc: compiler error message: add detail about literal
body:
What steps will reproduce the problem?

package main
func foo() (a, b, c int) {
        return 0, 1 2
}

What is the expected output?

err.go:3: syntax error: unexpected literal, expecting semicolon or newline or } or comma

What do you see instead?

err.go:3: syntax error: unexpected literal, expecting semicolon or newline or }

Which compiler are you using (5g, 6g, 8g, gccgo)?

6g

Which operating system are you using?

linux

Which revision are you using?  (hg identify)

70ee2f11ff52+ tip
